compatibility.notes: The BSD-3-Clause-No-Nuclear-License is a permissive license that allows for wide compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL due to their requirements for derivative works.

key_requirements: Redistribute source code with copyright notice and license.
Include license and copyright notice in binary distributions.
Do not use the name of Sun Microsystems, Inc. or contributors for promotion without permission.
license.name: BSD-3-Clause-No-Nuclear-License
obligations: Retain copyright notice in source code redistributions.
Include copyright notice and license in binary redistributions.
Obtain written permission for trademark use.
